feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar punctuation style, utilizing commas and periods effectively.

feature2.explanation: There is consistency in lexical and grammatical features, with the use of formal language and structured sentences.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are well-organized and coherent, demonstrating consistency in writing style.

feature4.explanation: Text and discourse features are aligned, focusing on conveying information logically and clearly.

feature5.explanation: There are no spelling or typographical errors in either text, indicating attention to detail in writing.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency across punctuation, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author is moderately high.
